name: idom2-pas
short_description:
The goal of the idom2 project is to develop a set
of interface-units and implementations based on 
libxml2, msxml and other parsers for
cross platform xml processing.
Standarts: dom2, xpath, xslt, sax. 
For Delphi/ Kylix.
